abilities.name: Bloodpuppet
abilities.description: Shed some blood to create a small puppet of blood that you can command to scout ahead. You can only learn what it saw once it returns and you investigate the blood.

evolutionOptions.name: Crimsonis Blood Reaper
evolutionOptions.features: Crimsonis's eyes glow with a crimson hue; his wings are edged with sharp, blade-like feathers. His presence is both captivating and intimidating.

enhancedAbilities.name: Bloodlust
enhancedAbilities.description: Increases attack power as health decreases.

enhancedAbilities.name: Hemorrhage
enhancedAbilities.description: Attacks cause enemies to bleed, dealing damage over time.

enhancedAbilities.name: Life Steal
enhancedAbilities.description: Heals himself for a portion of the damage dealt to enemies.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed during a blood moon in a place associated with past battles. The Diver helps Crimsonis embrace the power of blood magic.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Crimsonis becomes Crimsonis Ascended, gaining minor blood magic abilities but without full Blood Reaper powers.

evolutionOptions.name: Crimsonis Hemomancer
evolutionOptions.features: Crimsonis manipulates blood with ease; his wings flow like liquid, and his attire often drips with blood-like energy.

enhancedAbilities.name: Blood Control
enhancedAbilities.description: Can manipulate the blood within enemies, causing paralysis or damage.

enhancedAbilities.name: Crimson Shield
enhancedAbilities.description: Forms protective barriers made of solidified blood.

enhancedAbilities.name: Blood Puppet
enhancedAbilities.description: Temporarily control the actions of weakened foes.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in a ritual chamber with blood magic inscriptions. The Diver assists Crimsonis in mastering hemomancy.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Crimsonis becomes Crimsonis Ascended, gaining minor blood manipulation abilities but without full Hemomancer powers.

evolutionOptions.name: Crimsonis Night Hunter
evolutionOptions.features: Crimsonis becomes more nocturnal; his eyes adjust to darkness, and his movements are silent and swift.

enhancedAbilities.name: Night Vision
enhancedAbilities.description: Sees perfectly in the dark.

enhancedAbilities.name: Silent Predator
enhancedAbilities.description: Moves undetected, increasing stealth.

enhancedAbilities.name: Shadow Strike
enhancedAbilities.description: Deals extra damage when attacking from darkness.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed during the deepest part of the night. The Diver helps Crimsonis attune to nocturnal energies.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Crimsonis becomes Crimsonis Ascended, gaining minor nocturnal abilities but without full Night Hunter powers.

name: Hemoria
features: Vein-patterned wings that pulsate with life energy.

abilities.name: Unrivaled Vitality
abilities.description: Get rid of any external status (e.g poison, paralysis, etc).

abilities.name: Bloody Bridge
abilities.description: Use the blood of nearby corpses to built a temporary solid structure. Stays hardened for an hour.

abilities.name: Blood Scent Ward
abilities.description: Mask the scent of fresh kills or butchered carcasses so predators are less likely to gather.

abilities.name: Scavenger Eye
abilities.description: Briefly gain heightened vision for spotting dropped items or hidden remains in the wild.

abilities.name: Mark Nemesis
abilities.description: When your blood is on another creature you can mark them as your Nemesis. Any action you take towards each other you will be at an advantage, but they always know where you are - or vice versa. This mark cannot be undone by anything but death.

evolutionOptions.name: Hemoria Lifedrinker
evolutionOptions.features: Hemoria's aura drains vitality; her touch weakens foes.

enhancedAbilities.name: Vitality Drain
enhancedAbilities.description: Absorbs health from enemies to heal herself.

enhancedAbilities.name: Weakening Gaze
enhancedAbilities.description: Reduces enemies' strength and endurance.

enhancedAbilities.name: Aura of Decay
enhancedAbilities.description: Slowly saps the life of nearby enemies.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in a place associated with death and decay. The Diver helps Hemoria harness these energies.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Hemoria becomes Hemoria Ascended, gaining minor life-draining abilities but without full Lifedrinker powers.

evolutionOptions.name: Hemoria Sanguine Knight
evolutionOptions.features: Hemoria's armor is stained with the color of blood; she embodies the warrior spirit infused with blood magic.

enhancedAbilities.name: Blood Armor
enhancedAbilities.description: Increases defense and absorbs damage.

enhancedAbilities.name: Sanguine Strike
enhancedAbilities.description: Attacks deal extra damage based on missing health.

enhancedAbilities.name: Battle Frenzy
enhancedAbilities.description: Gains strength as the battle prolongs.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed on a battlefield or arena. The Diver and Hemoria commit to the warrior's path during the ritual.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Hemoria becomes Hemoria Ascended, gaining minor combat enhancements but without full Sanguine Knight powers.

evolutionOptions.name: Hemoria Bloodshadow
evolutionOptions.features: Hemoria blends blood magic with shadow, becoming elusive and deadly.

enhancedAbilities.name: Blood Mist
enhancedAbilities.description: Transforms into a mist to avoid attacks and move through spaces.

enhancedAbilities.name: Shadow Veil
enhancedAbilities.description: Becomes nearly invisible in darkness, granting advantage on stealth checks and making her harder to target.

enhancedAbilities.name: Hemorrhaging Shadows
enhancedAbilities.description: Attacks cause bleeding and conceal the enemy's vision.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in a dark, secluded place. The Diver helps Hemoria merge shadow and blood magic.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Hemoria becomes Hemoria Ascended, gaining minor shadow and blood abilities but without full Bloodshadow powers.

name: Sanguis
features: Deep red, leathery wings with a sinister aura.

abilities.name: Occultation Mark
abilities.description: Place a faint sigil on your own hide or clothing, preventing mild curses from latching onto you. Stays active for 1 hour.

abilities.name: Shadow Crafter
abilities.description: You can work any crafting method without being able to see for 1 creation.

abilities.name: Blood Purification
abilities.description: Burn any foreign substance from a collection of blood.

abilities.name: Blood Attunement
abilities.description: In a brief ritual, sense faint leftover emotions in spilled blood, gleaning hints about the events mood.

abilities.name: Crimson Douse
abilities.description: Easily extinguish fire with the use of nearby blood

evolutionOptions.name: Sanguis Bloodshadow
evolutionOptions.features: Sanguis's form becomes shadowy and fluid; she can move through shadows with ease. Her wings emit a faint crimson glow, and her presence is both alluring and menacing.

enhancedAbilities.name: Shadow Step
enhancedAbilities.description: Teleports between shadows over short distances, allowing for quick repositioning and surprise attacks.

enhancedAbilities.name: Venom Strike
enhancedAbilities.description: Combines poison with shadow magic for enhanced attacks, dealing both poison and necrotic damage.

enhancedAbilities.name: Shadow Cloak
enhancedAbilities.description: Becomes nearly invisible in darkness, granting advantage on stealth checks and making her harder to target.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Conducted in a shadow-infested area within the Tower. The Diver channels shadow and poison energies into Sanguis while reciting the Venom Shadow's Whisper, merging shadow and poison magic to elevate her to Bloodshadow.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Sanguis becomes Sanguis Ascended, gaining minor shadow and poison abilities but without the full Bloodshadow powers.

evolutionOptions.name: Sanguis Darkblood Reaver
evolutionOptions.features: Sanguis's wings are adorned with dark, blood-red feathers; her attire is enhanced with bone and crimson accents. Her presence radiates a sinister aura that weakens foes.

enhancedAbilities.name: Darkblood Reave
enhancedAbilities.description: Performs powerful melee attacks that drain life from enemies, healing Sanguis with each successful strike.

enhancedAbilities.name: Crimson Aura
enhancedAbilities.description: Emits an aura that saps the strength of nearby enemies, reducing their attack and defense capabilities.

enhancedAbilities.name: Blood Ritual
enhancedAbilities.description: Can perform blood rituals that provide temporary buffs to allies or debilitating effects to enemies, such as increased strength or reduced speed.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in a blood-stained arena within the Tower. The Diver assists Sanguis in performing a blood ritual while channeling dark energies and reciting the Darkblood Reaver's Rite to infuse her with dark blood magic.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Sanguis becomes Sanguis Ascended, gaining minor life-draining abilities but without the full Darkblood Reaver powers.

evolutionOptions.name: Sanguis Necrotic Assassin
evolutionOptions.features: Sanguis's presence becomes more spectral; her wings shimmer with necrotic energy. Her movements are swift and precise, making her a deadly assassin on the battlefield.

enhancedAbilities.name: Necrotic Blade
enhancedAbilities.description: Infuses her weapons with necrotic energy, increasing damage and applying debilitating effects such as reducing enemy movement speed.

enhancedAbilities.name: Shadow Veil
enhancedAbilities.description: Creates a veil of necrotic energy that obscures her presence, granting advantage on stealth checks and making her harder to target.

enhancedAbilities.name: Death's Embrace
enhancedAbilities.description: Can perform a lethal strike that deals massive necrotic damage and potentially kills weakened enemies instantly.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Conducted in the Towers necropolis chamber during a lunar eclipse. The Diver channels necrotic energies into Sanguis while reciting the Necrotic Assassin's Oath, empowering her with deadly necrotic magic.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Sanguis becomes Sanguis Ascended, gaining enhanced necrotic abilities but without the full Necrotic Assassin powers.
